name: Battle Tracks
description:
Battle Tracks is a third-person, action-adventure shooter. Find yourself
thrown into the chaos of an unknown battlefield with a variety of terrains
to be explored and enemies to be defeated.

Striking Visuals




With six unique, hand-crafted terrains, you'll never run short of new,
explosive eye candy. Bright explosions, flaming bullets, and terrifyingly
immersive enemy bosses bring you hours of visually-compelling gameplay.

Exhilerating Gameplay




Berated with bullets and missiles from all sides, you'll have to stay fully
engaged to dodge the enemy's attacks and make it to the next terrain.

Build Your Own Map




Let your creativity run wild with our in-game map builder. Use all available
map elements to create your own, unique maps to challenge your friends.

Competitive Local Multiplayer




Come together for endless rounds of competitive Pvp with your friends! You'll
enjoy all the amazing features of single-player for now, but stay tuned for
multiplayer-exclusive updates!
